name: 3rd International Conference on IoT, Social, Mobile, Analytics and Cloud in Computational Vision and Bio-Engineering ISMAC-CVB 2021
content: The 3rd International Conference on IoT, Social, Mobile, Analytics and Cloud in Computational Vision and Bio-Engineering (ISMAC - CVB 2021) is being organized on 29-30, October 2021 by St. Mother Theresa Engineering College, Thoothukudi, Tamil Nadu, India. ISMAC- CVB 2021 will provide an outstanding international forum for sharing knowledge and results in all future fields of Internet of Things, Social, Mobile, Analytics and Cloud. ISMAC- CVB 2021 provides quality key experts who provide an opportunity in bringing up innovative ideas. Recent updates in the field of Computational Vision and Bio-Engineering will be a platform for the upcoming researchers.
